name: 陳盈君　Office Hours
objective:
本課程主要介紹幾何光學及干涉之基本概念與應用，本課程首先介紹幾何光學，並介紹相關光學的研究。本課程的訓練旨在提供機械領域的學生有關光學的知識，讓機械領域的學生有能力加入機光電技術整合。本課程適合對光學有興趣的學生來修習。
This course will mainly introduce the basic knowledge of geometrical optics, interference, and their applications. The main idea of this course is to provide some knowledge of optics to students from mechanical engineering backgrounds, hoping the students can involve in the field of Optomechatronic Integration Engineering. This course is also welcoming all the students from different backgrounds
schedule:
W1 Brief Introduction
W2 Nature fo Light
W3 Geometrical Optics I
W4 Geometrical Optics II
W5 Optical Instrumentation I
W6 Optical Instrumentation II
W7 Matrix methods in paraxial optics
W8 Microscopy
W9 Mid-term Exam
W10 Optics of the eye
W11 Properties of laser
W12 Optical Tweezer
W13 Spectrometer 
W14 Optical Interferometry
W15 Interference of light 
W16 Coherence
W17 Final-exam
W18 Final-term report
